trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Bethel Park
There were no other sightings in Bethel Park on or around February 17th 2012
Summary: glowing blue, orb-like sphere that seemed to "burn out" and go dark seconds later
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out on my back porch and noticed a bright, blue bulb that literally appeared to be glowing as it briskly moved through the sky for about five seconds before "burning out". I kept thinking it might be a meteorite without a streak? It was definitely too low to be a star, and it made no noise. I saw several (4-5) planes flying in the general area although much higher at the same time.
